blocks.name: prodf
blocks.content: An infinite product of complex terms is a function from an upper set of integers to ` CC ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 4-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm prodf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2, cc))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cuz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  seqf(s0, hs0, c0, cmul, c1, c2, cc, w0)
  adantl(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs0)), cc))
  mulcl(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cmul)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c3), c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wne(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), nat0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c3, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpcom(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c3), c2))), wcel(c2, co(c0, cfz, c2)))

thm prodfdiv(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), co(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c3), c2), cdiv, cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c4), c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wne(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), nat0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c1), c2), co(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c3), c2), cdiv, cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c4), c2)), co(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c3), c2), cmul, cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))), c2)), co(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c3), c2), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c4), c2))), w0)
  oveq2d(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c3), c2), cmul, cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))), c2), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c4), c2)), w0)
  prodfrec(s0, c0, cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), c2, c4, w0)
  prodfmul(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), w0)
  ffvelrnda(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2), cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), cc, w0)
  fmpttd(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), cc, w0)
  reccld(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2))))
  chvarv(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cc)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cc)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cc), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cc))
  eleq1d(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cc, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  chvarv(s0, hs0, wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wne(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wne(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), nat0)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wne(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), nat0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wne(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), nat0))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2))
  neeq1d(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), nat0, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  fveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c4)
  3eqtr4d(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), cv(s0))), co(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), co(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cmul, co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))))
  divrecd(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))))
  oveq2d(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cmul, cfv(cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), cv(s0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), cv(s0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))))
  fvmpt(hs0, cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2), cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0))), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))
  oveq2d(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c4)
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))))
  ovex(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))
  divrecd(cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c3), c2), cfv(cseq(c0, cmul, c4), c2), w0)
  seqcl(s0, hs1, c0, cmul, c3, c2, cc, w0)
  seqcl(s0, hs1, c0, cmul, c4, c2, cc, w0)
  adantl(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cc))
  mulcl(cv(s0), cv(hs1))
  prodfn0(s0, c0, c4, c2, w0)
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, hs0, co(c0, cfz, c2), co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))
  diff.co.s(s0, nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cdiv.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c0, cfz, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(co(nat1, cdiv, cfv(c4, cv(s0))))
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wi.s(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cc))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cc)
  diff.wi.s(s0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wne(cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), nat0))
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c2))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, c2)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.wne.s(s0, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), nat0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c4, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cmul)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
}
